body.p: Procedure for creating a new Environment.

ol.li:
Select your technology
Use CloudFoundry: Deploys the application to a Cloud Foundry endpoint.
Use Docker: Builds the application and pushes the image to a public or private DockerHub repository.
Use Lattice: Deploys the application to a simplified container cluster.

Provide the required information:
For Cloud Foundry, provide the Helion Cloud Foundry URL and the username and password for logging in and then click Connect.
For Docker Hub: doesn't seem functional yet.
For Lattice: doesn't seem functional yet.
